ComicInfo.Summary:
Hell comes to North Point as the remorseless Irons siblings spread unbridled violence and their monstrous curse to the helpless town folk. When the moon ascends over the burning scar that was a border town, the innocent victims rise again as creatures of the night, laying in wait for the pursuing gunfighter determined to end the curse. This year's biggest supernatural western tale continues and no one is safe from the coming storm.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-14 15:10:17. [CVDB154287]
